NAME

VulnMessage - Parses raw format (html,text,email) messages into the database fields

SYNOPSIS

  use VulnMessage;

ABSTRACT

  SuperClass that will be extended by all message specific implementation classes.
   1 
   2 package VulnMessage;
   3 
   4 use 5.008;
   5 use strict;
   6 use warnings;
   7 use Carp;
   8 
   9 use base qw(Class::Accessor);
  10 # create nice accessors -- i.e. <get> = $object->user -- <set> = $object->user($someuser)
  11 VulnMessage->mk_accessors( qw(msg body subject) );
  12 
  13 our $VERSION = '0.01';
  14 
  15 #Note: all classes desecended from VulnMessage are expected to have at least the attributes defined in this new()
  16 sub new {
  17 
  18     #Init
  19     my $class = shift;
  20     my $msg = shift;
  21     my $self = { msg=>$msg, body=>'', subject=>'' };
  22     bless $self, $class;
  23 
  24     return $self;
  25 
  26 }
  27 
  28 1;
